means: 美国印地安人或爱斯基摩人

sentence.Network_en: S : The people are largely an amalgam of Amerindian, Spanish and African.
sentence.Network_cn: 波多黎各的居民是美国印第安人, 西班牙人和非洲人的混合体.

sentence.Network_en: Canadian art, contemporary art, Amerindian art, and decorative arts.
sentence.Network_cn: 收藏加拿大艺术 、 当代艺术 、 印第安人艺术和装饰艺术.

sentence.Network_en: That may reflect an Amerindian tradition of collective decision - making.
sentence.Network_cn: 那可能反映了一个印第安传统的统一表决的事实.

entry.def: Amerindian means the same as American Indian .

means.word_mean: 1. any member of the peoples living in North or South America before the Europeans arrived

auth_sentence.content: "To the Jesuits, Amerindian society was really shocking, " says Marie Coulombe, one of the park's guides.
